channel.title: Questions regarding posting a server on moparscape status page
channel.description:
this may be the wrong place to post this, o well, you move it i you want thats not my job.
Anyway this is my very first post here i just joined and im jw after you click register server do you have to wait for it to get approved? becuz i clicked it and it just pretty much refreshed the page and nothing happend. and i dont wanna keep clicking it over and over cuz that is probably spam and i dont wanna get in trouble for it.
So please, just give me a few directions and tell me what is suppost to happen if you succesfully register a server.
